SEARCH
Package de.unistuttgart.ils.aircraftsystemsarchitect.engine.config

Class GameConfiguration

java.lang.Object
de.unistuttgart.ils.aircraftsystemsarchitect.engine.config.GameConfiguration
public class GameConfiguration extends Object
Configurator class for different settings of the game. Collection of references to other classes, e.g. rendering options, controls options, language settings, ...
